title: Test harness called mladmin abort on 5.0 Linux 64 RH6 machine in test admin_api_tests_http_appserver2.xml.
description:
Test harness called mladmin abort on 5.0 Linux 64 RH6 machine in test admin_api_tests_http_appserver2.xml.

Test name : admin_api_tests_http_appserver2.xml
Machine name : rh6-intel64-43-test-1
ML Version : 20130111
Path to Error Log : /space/builder/builds/linux64/b5_0/logs.20130111.0/reg-results/ErrorLog_sigabrt.txt
Path to pstack Log : /space/builder/builds/linux64/b5_0/logs.20130111.0/reg-results/pstack.log

changeHistory.comment: Hi Sumit, did this happen just once, or is it ongoing? If it is ongoing, please assign back to me.
This is not reproducible. Will log a new bug if it occurs again. Verified on ML Version from 20130112 - 20130116. Hence closing this issue.
